'''''Amon Hen'' 299''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in February [[2023]].

==Contents==
* Front cover: Annatar by Neldeathstar
* '''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
* '''4''' - Annual General Meeting 2023
* '''6''' - Valuing Middle-earth: Reflections on Amazon's Rings of Power by Michael Livesey
* '''12''' - “Come What May”: on the Flawed Beauty of The Rings of Power, and why I’m excited for more by S.R. Westvik
* '''16''' - How Frodo Met Beren & Lúthien by Starý Bral
* '''18''' - Centerfold: Galadriel by Christopher Pickman
* '''20''' - Concerning Racism and Tolkien by Connor McClain
* '''26''' - Four Shire Stone Restoration by Tom Knight
* '''28''' - Mathom
* '''30''' - Dating Tolkien #5 by Mick Henry
* '''31''' - News From Fangorn
* '''32''' - Behind Glass Doors by Ian Collier
* '''34''' - All Brân by Ian Spittlehouse
* Back Cover: Celebrimbor by Neldeathstar
